name: marked-ast
description: Parses Markdown into an abstract syntax tree. Based on github.com/chjj/marked.
author: Patrick Dubroy <pdubroy@gmail.com> (http://dubroy.com)

scripts.update-tests: git submodule init && git submodule update && cp -r third_party/marked/test test/chjj-marked/test
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint
